name: T.C.G. Trading Card Gambling
description:
Twenty generative posters about the Pokemon trading card game and booster packs, visualizing the chances of finding rare cards. The goal is creating awareness on the strong parallelism between trading card games and gambling.

The posters are generated through a creative coding script using the OPENRNDR framework framework.

name: EKSIG
description:
Website for the conference Eksig 2023: From Abstractness to Concreteness. Experiential knowledge and the role of prototypes in design research, hosted by the Department of Design of Politecnico di Milano.

An interactive and generative cover has been designed for the website to symbolize the transition from the abstract nature of a concept to the tangible reality of a prototype.

name: Inquest
description:
Videogames monetization has become more and more predatory over the years, with the exploitation of behavioral psychology to lure people into spending money.

However, the most part of the governments in the world is still reluctant to address these systems as gambling, as well as to take measures against them. Inquest is an independent magazine that analyzes the subtle mechanics developed by the industry, for the purpose of making the consumers aware.

The series is formed by four issues, each one addressing one particular gambling trick used by the industry. Issue 0, the one that was fully designed and printed, focuses on loot boxes.
